name: Ningaloo Coral Bay Backpackers
description:
The Ningaloo Club offers purpose built, superior backpacker accommodation located at Coral Bay, only metres from the beach and all the wonders of the Ningaloo Reef. 

With a large entertaining area containing a licensed bar, table tennis, pool table and an internet room, the Ningaloo Club also offers a well-equipped kitchen and BBQ's. There is also a central courtyard around a swimming pool and an alfresco dining area. 

Tour bookings are available at Reception, including coral viewing, snorkelling and other adventure tours on the beautiful Ningaloo Reef.

Please note our cancellation policy and house rules below. Please note, if you are under 18 years old you must have a legal parent or guardian staying with you in any room type.

Check-in is available from 1.00pm to 9.00pm. Please advise Reception prior to 5pm on day of check-in if you will be arriving After Hours.
Check-out is 10.00am.

Free cancellation to 21 days prior to check-in. Cancellation within 21 days of check-in will be charged 1 night.

houseRules.notes:
Ningaloo Coral Bay Backpackers is a fully licenced venue. All guests must be above 18 years old to book. Any guests booking under 18 years old will need to be supervised by a legal parent or guardian at all times (therefore must book the same room). Photo ID must be provided upon check-in. The free cancellation period will be 21 days before arrival.
Check-in is from 1.00pm to 9.00pm. Please contact Reception prior to 5pm if you will be arriving After Hours: (the contact details will be found in your confirmation letter).  
Check-out is by 9.30am
Reception open daily with the exception of 25 December and 01 January â€“ no check-in or check-out permitted on either of these days.
Free cancellation to 21 days prior to check-in. Cancellation within 21 days of check-in will be charged 1 night.
